title: Relief/Descendants and Estates of Charles Greenlee, Walter Irvin, Samuel Shepherd, and Ernest Thomas/State of Florida
subject: (claims bills)

abstracts.abstract:
Relief/Descendants and Estates of Charles Greenlee, Walter Irvin, Samuel Shepherd, and Ernest Thomas/State of Florida;  Provides that certain facts are found & declared to be true; provides that sum is appropriated from General Revenue Fund to DOS for specified relief; provides that specified persons are ineligible for further compensation. 
    
        CLAIM WITH APPROPRIATION:
        Indeterminate
